observation: I can see a residence selection page with a country/region dropdown field that shows 'Select' as placeholder text. There are also language selection modals visible in the background that seem to be overlapping the main content. I need to close these language modals first before proceeding with the country selection.
reasoning: As a normal user, I would be confused by the overlapping language modals and would want to close them first to access the main signup form clearly. I can see a close button (×) at element 31 for one of the language modals.
ux_issues: Multiple language selection modals are overlapping the main signup form
The modals are blocking access to the main signup flow

outcome.visual_observation: The language modal/overlay with colorful dotted borders and highlighted elements has been closed. The page now shows a clean interface without the visual debugging annotations that were present in the before screenshot.
